title: sick to death of AFK's
body: Why is it every 3ed game i have an AFK in a ranked game only to lose points an start gain every time.. its absolutely frustrating an  knowing the report system doesn't work im starting to wonder why these people are allowed to keep playing ranked games. i think there should be stronger bans an more on the spot bans for a longer duration to stop this from happening .. thoughts ?

replies.body:
We currently have an automated system to detect afks.
It works really well, picking up players who are leaving (whether it be rage quitting, or potato tier internet) and dishing out punishments in the form of low priority queues. 

As Riot understand that sometimes emergencies do happen, players will not usually get punished after leaving one game (unless maybe in ranked, where everything is treated more harshly). You can read more about lever buster [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h1q2)

To indefinitely avoid players leaving your games, i would suggest creating/joining a premade team. On top of avoiding lagging/afk players, you also minimise general toxicity, and can make friends. You also get extra IP, master points and an increased chance of hextech loot :D
